removeOwner(address).details: Allows to remove an owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

getController().notice: Returns the address of the current owner

setAddAdminList(address,uint256).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`).         Can only be called by the current owner

setController(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`).         Can only be called by the current owner
